name: Create Sendcloud labels from Google Sheets
description: Every time a new row is added to Google Sheets, Make will automatically create a Sendcloud parcel and its corresponding label. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12Xng1Ed2NrTsZ56U2q1O0jq9A6L52G6uM0hAfFk3alM/edit?usp=sharing).
